page.title: 10Food,Diet and Health.
page.content: Food is the most vital part in ensuring that we retain our health.A typical daily diet consists of: Breakfast:_ Various cereals which are high in vitamins and iron. Lunch:_ May just be a snack or a a salad.All vegetables contain various vitamins which are good for the teeth,bones and the blood.Salads are also refreshing,especially in the summer. Dinner:_ This is the main meal of the day for most people.It usually consists of meat or fish,which contain iron,green vegetables and potatoes,which contain carbohydrates. In this day and age we are becoming more and more conscious of the importance of a healthy diet and we are seeing a great deal more activity from food manufacturers and the media to persuade us to get healthy and fit.
